description: Batai first appears in the 11th episode of Shin Koihime Musou to train under her cousin Bachou and made friends with Riri at Touka village. Due to Bachiu harsh training methods, Batai gets her revenge on her by tricking her to drink a giant gourd of water and not allowing her to use the bathroom by sundown or faced being called a bed wetter.
name: Batai
